thread.title: Grupo Ezentis unit wins contract in Brazil for about 20 mln euros
thread.title_full: BRIEF-Grupo Ezentis unit wins contract in Brazil for about 20 mln euros | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Grupo Ezentis unit wins contract in Brazil for about 20 mln euros
text:
Sept 2 Grupo Ezentis SA :
* Says its Brazilian unit, Ezentis Energia SA, wins a new contract for various commercial services in the electrical area in Salvador, Feira de Santana and Serrinha for about 20 million euros ($23 million)
* Says 4-year contract was awarded by COELBA, an electricity distributor in the state of Bahia
 ($1 = 0.8862 euros) (Gdynia Newsroom)
